title: We The People
description: Join us to stand together and protect the Constitution, inspired by Thomas Jefferson's words.
raw_text:
We The People

“The people are the only sure reliance for the preservation of our liberty.” - Thomas Jefferson
Stand with us. Protect the Constitution.
Sept 17, 7:30-9PM • Sedgwick County Historical Courthouse
510 N Main, Wichita, KS 67203

LEADING KANSAS

title: ACT UP Protest
description: Join us in a recurring protest to make a difference. Bring flags or signs, or use extras provided. Upcoming dates include October 4 & 18, and November 15.
raw_text:
NOW is the time to ACT UP!
Every other Saturday at the Corner of Harmony Road & Weitzel
9:00-10ish AM
Bring a protest sign or your flag if you have them. If not, we have extras for you.
Together we can make a difference. Upcoming dates:
Oct 4 & 18
Nov 15

September 20, 2025
9:00-10:00 am
Harmony Rd & Weitzel St,
Timnath, CO

Indivisible Timnath
raw_summary: The image is a flyer announcing a recurring protest event every other Saturday at the corner of Harmony Road & Weitzel in Timnath, Colorado. Participants are encouraged to bring protest signs or flags. Upcoming dates are listed, with the next specific event on September 20, 2025, from 9:00-10:00 AM. The organizing group is 'Indivisible Timnath.'

OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE
OVERPASS BANNERING

20 SEPTEMBER 2025
FROM 12:00 TO 2:00

CUSTER WAY / I-5
TUMWATER

BRING YOUR HIGH-VISIBILITY PROTEST SIGNS, FLAGS, & A GOOD MOOD, AND JOIN US ON THE BRIDGE TO MAKE GOOD TROUBLE!

DEMOCRACY IS UNDER ATTACK STAND UP FIGHT BACK!

MORE INFORMATION: BACKBONECAMPAIGN.ORG AND THEBLOP.ORG

title: Tesla Takedown Northbrook
description: Join us as we protest against Elon Musk’s influence and its consequences. Let's keep the pressure on and impact the stock price. Stand with us in Northbrook!
raw_text:
Saturday, Sept. 20th, 2025
#MuskMustFall #TeslaTakedown
Tesla Takedown Northbrook
12PM-2PM
1200 Skokie Blvd
Northbrook IL 60062
MUSK MUST FALL
Elon left DOGE a few months ago, but he is still using his power and influence to incite right-wing violence and inflict harm. Let’s keep the pressure on and the stock price down!
Text MUSK to 51905 to join the fight! Go to TeslaTakedown.com to learn more!
Flyer by Taylor
raw_summary: The image describes an event titled 'Tesla Takedown Northbrook' scheduled for Saturday, September 20th, 2025, from 12 PM to 2 PM at 1200 Skokie Blvd, Northbrook, IL 60062. It appears to be a protest against Elon Musk, emphasizing his alleged negative influence. Participants are encouraged to join the cause.

title: No Kings
description: We are organizing a nationwide protest at the Westmoreland County Courthouse to pressure Congress, stand up for righteousness, and advocate for the impeachment and removal of those in power if necessary. Join us to uphold justice and affirm that there are no kings in America.
raw_text:
NO KINGS
NATIONWIDE PROTEST
OCTOBER 18 12-2PM
WESTMORELAND COUNTY COURTHOUSE
2 NORTH MAIN ST. GREENSBURG, PA
Pressure congress to uphold justice!
There are no kings in America!
Stand up for righteousness!
Impeach, convict, REMOVE!
WWW.WTFCANIDOWESTMORELAND.ORG
raw_summary: The image is a flyer for a nationwide protest event titled "No Kings" at the Westmoreland County Courthouse in Greensburg, PA, scheduled for October 18 from 12 PM to 2 PM. The event calls to pressure Congress, stand up for righteousness, and remove those in power if necessary. The website provided is www.wtfcanidowestmoreland.org.

title: No Kings 2.0
description: The event promotes the constitutional principle that no individual should be above the law and discourages monarchy or privileges based on birth or title. Organized by LD #20 Democrats, Centralia.Mobilize, and Rural Lewis Indivisible.
address: George Washington Park Sidewalk on S. Pearl St.
raw_text:
NO KINGS 2.0

The Constitution establishes a system where no individual, including the President, is above the law and it actively discourages the establishment of a monarchy or any system that grants special privileges based on birth or title.

Join Us October 18th, 2025, 1PM to 3PM

George Washington Park Sidewalk on S. Pearl St.
Centralia, Washington

Organized by LD #20 Democrats, Centralia.Mobilize and Rural Lewis Indivisible
raw_summary: The image promotes an event titled "No Kings 2.0". It discusses the constitutional avoidance of monarchy and is scheduled for October 18th, 2025, from 1 PM to 3 PM at George Washington Park, Centralia, Washington. It is organized by LD #20 Democrats, Centralia.Mobilize, and Rural Lewis Indivisible.
